articles.title: JBL’s latest portable speakers bring the light show - The Verge
articles.description: JBL’s portable Pulse 5 and more powerful PartyBox Encore feature integrated lightshows, while the new BoomBox 3 brings chest-thumping bass. All three should arrive this summer.
